data.description:
üî•üî•üî• THE FULL GAME IS NOW OUT! ENJOY COLLECTIBLES, TROPHIES, VICTORY ROOMS AND MORE!üî•üî•üî•

üß©Join unique puzzle adventures in Rooms of Realities! üß©
Rooms of Realities offers unique and well-balanced puzzles to solve alone or with friends! Enter the mysterious levels full of logic, mechanics, precision, memory, cooperation, cipher, and skill-based challenges! And don‚Äôt worry if you get stuck - our smart, yet non-invasive hint system will help you get back on track.

üîç Play solo or with your friends! üîç
The game offers both co-op and single-player modes. Solve all the puzzles by yourself or play with your friends! Work together, help each other and, what‚Äôs most important, communicate to finish the adventures.

üîçPlay 9 different chapters in 3 unique scenarios! üîç
The game now offers 9 chapters full of puzzles set in 3 different scenarios: an ancient pyramid, an underwater station, and even an asylum. Each environment holds its own story and 3 atmospheric chapters to play. 

üîçGet all the collectibles and take a photo in the victory room! üîç
Gather collectibles, win a trophy for completing each scenario, and after all that hard work take a photo with your friends in our victory rooms! These special sceneries will let you save all the best memories in one click.

changelog.change_log: - (Nemo's Mysterious Formula - Chapter 3) Fixed Issue: The wooden panels puzzle now correctly recognizes solutions when solved by two or more players.

- Fixed an issue where a domino piece was glued to the floor for some players in Chapter 2.
- Fixed an issue where the stone rings in the labyrinth were behaving uncontrollably.

- Fixed an issue that prevented players from entering the room in cooperative mode in Chapter 3.
- Fixed an issue where cranks didn't progress the puzzle in solo mode in Chapter 3.
